Description: What if you could identify which patients will respond to your treatment before taking a drug to trial? Owkin will walk through the ways AI has unearthed a new approach to drug discovery and development, one which places a deep understanding of patient biology and disease at its core. Biomarker identification and patient subgrouping is a critical step on the road to achieving precision medicine, and one where multimodal data and AI can bring tremendous value.
Location: Spotlight Theater C - Sails Pavilion - Conv Ctr
SearchResultBody: ESP6C. Patterns in patients: Why precision medicine needs multimodal data and AI

Title: Patterns in patients: Why precision medicine needs multimodal data and AI
